-[laughter] -Are you expecting a boy or a girl?

It means that we are hoping to bring Aldovia
into the 21st Century culturally, just as the new Aldovia initiative

I'm pretty sure research debunked the myth

Prince Rudy's birth.

Mr. Little.

Lynn?

I get it. He's opinionated.

translation.en: It was a lead. We follow leads, remember?
translation.ko: 사힐 말이 단서였어 우린 단서를 따라가잖아, 알지?

translation.en: I do, it's just we have a multi-million dollar business now
translation.ko: 알아, 다만 이제 우리한텐 수백만 달러짜리 사업이 있어서

translation.en: and Sahil would never risk it.
Multi-million dollars, really?
Yeah. So if you wanna write a story, write about us.
translation.ko: 응, 그러니 기사를 쓸 거면 우리 이야기를 써줘

translation.en: -Like a puff piece? -Exactly.
-After the baby, of course. -Of course.
[exhales] Tell me you had success.
Thanks to your little ruse, the last hour's felt like a month.
translation.ko: 당신 계략 덕분에 한 시간이 한 달처럼 느껴졌어

translation.en: -Once Sahil gets in the zone-- -He didn't take it.
translation.ko: 사힐은 집중하기 시작하면... 사힐은 안 가져갔어

translation.en: You're right,
I don't need to focus on this missing treaty.
translation.ko: 사라진 협의문에 신경 쓸 필요 없어

translation.en: [Richard] No, you absolutely don't.
Actually, you do.
Emily.
I'm not meant to tell you this because it's probably rubbish.
translation.ko: 쓸데없는 말일 것 같아서 말하지 않는 게 나을지 몰라요

translation.en: But...
a curse will befall the King and Queen responsible for breaking the treaty.
translation.ko: 협약을 깨는 데 원인을 제공한 왕과 왕비에겐 저주가 내릴 거예요

translation.en: Seriously? A curse?
Concocted by a sorceress to ensure the treaty wasn't broken.
translation.ko: 협약이 깨지지 않도록 마법사가 꾸몄던 일이래요

translation.en: Sorcery. Hardly a cause for concern.
If the treaty isn't signed in time, by midnight Christmas Eve,
it takes effect.
Why are you putting stock in this nonsense?
It's a curse on your firstborn.
On this baby?
Our baby.
According to the history book.
The chance of this being real is infinitesimal.
I don't care if it's one in a billion, I'm not risking it.
We need to find this treaty.
[woman over PA] Attention, flight 1225 -[planes flying overhead] -to Aldovia is still canceled.
Eh, no clue when they'll start letting flights in,
but I'll be on the first one as soon as they do.
translation.ko: 다시 비행기가 뜨면 제일 먼저 타고 가마

translation.en: How about you guys, how you doing?
Honestly, disaster on all fronts.
Melissa is in love with Simon.
We have to cancel tomorrow's baby shower, the treaty is missing
translation.ko: 내일 임신 축하 파티를 취소해야 하는 데다 협의문까지 사라졌어요

translation.en: and if we don't find it by midnight on Christmas Eve,
our baby is cursed.
Hold on, you're gonna have to explain that one.
-It's a long story. -Emphasis on story,
translation.ko: - 이야기가 길어요 - 여기서 중요한 건 이야기예요

translation.en: and we have until Christmas Eve to sort it out.
-Tomorrow's only the 23rd. -[Rudy exhales steadily]
Well, I don't know much about this supernatural stuff,
but go easy on Melissa, huh?
Love makes people do funny things.
translation.ko: 사랑에 빠진 사람들은 이상한 짓을 하기 마련이지

translation.en: You gave up New York slices and bagels for meat jelly.
translation.ko: 너도 뉴욕 베이글을 포기하고 고기 젤리를 먹고 살잖니

translation.en: Oh! Could you please bring me some bagels?
You got it.
Now, why'd you cancel your baby shower?
translation.ko: 그런데 임신 축하 파티는 왜 취소했니?

translation.en: No one can get here. The storm.
There's plenty of people in the palace. Have it anyway.
It just doesn't feel like the right time.
translation.ko: 파티하기에 좋은 때가 아닌 것 같아요

translation.en: From what you're saying, sounds like a little hope and joy
translation.ko: 네 말을 들어 보니 지금 궁에 필요한 건 희망과 기쁨 같구나

translation.en: is just what the palace needs.
translation.ko: 지금 궁에 필요한 건 희망과 기쁨 같구나

translation.en: Have the shower.
[Emily, echoing] A curse upon the firstborn,
upon the firstborn...
[hushed] Richard.
[Amber] The Royal Scandal of the Fathers of the Silk Road Treaty.
translation.ko: '실크 로드 협정의 아버지들이 벌인 왕실 추문'

translation.en: Royal scandal?
Did you know there was a love triangle
between Prince Claude and Prince Jun over Claude's newlywed, Princess Jocelyn?
translation.ko: 클로드의 아내 조셀린 공주를 두고 클로드 왕자와 준 왕자가 다퉜대

translation.en: I believe they taught us that at boarding school.
Oh my gosh!
Soon after the royal treaty was signed,
Prince Claude was poisoned. Many believed Prince Jun did it.
translation.ko: 클로드 왕자가 독살됐는데 다들 준 왕자의 소행이라고 믿었대

translation.en: The house of Devon, Claude's family, fell out of power
translation.ko: 클로드의 가족인 데번 가문이 권력에서 밀려났고

translation.en: and Claude's descendants swore vengeance.
Devon.
Why does that name sound familiar?
You're up early, my dear.
Oh, I couldn't sleep.
Baby had a restless night.
One day, you'll look back on all the sleepless nights
and you'll realize -they're amongst your sweetest memories. -[Amber chuckles]
translation.ko: 그게 가장 달콤한 추억들 중 하나였다는 걸 깨닫게 될 거야

translation.en: It's a big change, isn't it?
It's the greatest adventure,
but your life will never be the same again.
translation.ko: 무엇보다 네 인생이 완전히 달라질 거야

translation.en: There are so many things that I wish I could ask my mom.
translation.ko: 궁금한 게 너무 많아요 엄마한테 물어보면 좋을 텐데요

translation.en: Amber, never forget that she's right here.
Her spirit's in you and your baby.
translation.ko: 그분의 영혼이 너와 네 아기 속에 깃들어 있어

translation.en: She gave you good instincts
and, through your baby, she'll guide you,
always.
I'm so grateful I have you.
I'm here.
For anything.
When you were expecting Emily, did you try hypnobirthing?
translation.ko: 에밀리 임신하셨을 때 최면 출산 해 보셨나요?

translation.en: Hypnobirthing?
What on earth is hypnobirthing?
[Dr. Magoro through laptop] Fear causes the body to tense up
and pain in childbirth becomes a self-fulfilling prophecy.
translation.ko: 출산의 고통은 저절로 실현되는 예언이 되죠

translation.en: So you're saying no pain is really an option?
Language is powerful
and we want to have a positive view of birth.
For instance, instead of contractions,
we'll call them surges.
-Surges? -[stammers] Like a surge of energy?
Exactly. Your body is powerful.
And during labor, every surge you feel
is a wave of relaxation,
pleasure and love.
Lucky you, men don't get those.
translation.ko: 당신은 좋겠네 남자는 그런 거 없잖아

translation.en: I want you both to lie back and close your eyes.
translation.ko: 두 분 다 등을 대고 누워서 눈을 감아보세요

translation.en: I'm going to lead you into a guided imagery meditation.
translation.ko: 유도 심상 명상법으로 두 분을 이끌어 드릴게요

translation.en: Imagine a surge,
relaxation, pleasure, love.
Feel its pulse.
We thought we'd be home by now, too.
translation.ko: 우리도 지금쯤이면 집에 도착할 줄 알았어

translation.en: No, you may not peek at your presents.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 선물을 엿보면 안 되지

translation.en: [laughs] We'll be home as soon as we're able.
Love you!
Bye, now.
[sighs] This predicament must be resolved.
If only the children were stuck here with us, wouldn't be so bad.
translation.ko: 애들이랑 같이 있다면 훨씬 좋을 텐데 말이야

translation.en: No place is more Christmassy.
Leave it to you to find light in any situation.
I assume that's why you keep me around.
translation.ko: 그래서 당신이 날 버리지 않나 봐

translation.en: Still, I'd like to find a way home.
If we don't stay to sign the truce treaty,
translation.ko: 여기에 남아 휴전 협정에 서명하지 않으면

translation.en: our kingdoms technically return to a state of war.
translation.ko: 두 왕국은 법적으론 전시로 되돌아가게 돼

translation.en: Of course, a war that would be fought by lawyers. [sighs]
Just a thought.
What if the Aldovians orchestrated this on purpose?
translation.ko: 알도비아 측에서 일부러 이 일을 꾸몄다면요?

translation.en: They want the treaty signed just as much as we do.
translation.ko: 알도비아도 우리만큼이나 협정을 체결하고 싶어 해

translation.en: Unless it's a way for them to force an unfair renegotiation of terms.
Renegotiation under duress?
No.
[Mr. Zabala] Good day, Your Majesties.
Forgive me, am I interrupting?
Not at all.
May I present, with the compliments and best wishes
translation.ko: 알도비아 앰버 왕비의 찬사와 경의의 마음을 전하며

translation.en: of Queen Amber of Aldovia.
Thank you and good day.
Hm. An invitation to attend Queen Amber's royal baby shower.
translation.ko: "왕실 임신 축하 파티" 앰버 왕비의 왕실 임신 축하 파티 초대장이군

translation.en: Today.
Amber!
-[Richard chuckles] -[playfully scoffs] Oh my goodness. It's amazing!
Seriously?
Your Majesty, our gift from S&A Events International.
Sahil, you have really outdone yourself.
And you, Andy.
-[cheery instrumentals] -We're here to celebrate new life
-and strong bonds. -[exclaims of agreement]
Thank you.
Baby guessing game. I love it!
Ladies and gentlemen, please, our Queen.
translation.ko: 여러분, 제가 맞혀 보죠 왕비 전하십니다

translation.en: -[group coos] -That's me.
-There I am, there. -[laughter]
[Mr. Zabala] And who is this little cutie?
Yeah, that's-- that's me.
[Mr. Zabala] Never would have guessed.
[gasps] Oh my goodness, look at this! -[group coos] -It's so cute!
translation.ko: 맙소사, 이것 좀 봐 정말 귀여워요

translation.en: Thank you so much, guys.
-[cooing] -Will you look at this little bear.
-Oh, that is-- Look at the little ears. -[laughter]
So cute!
For you.
Did you make this?
Today.
Thank you so much.
That's so sweet.
Queen Amber, King Richard. My gift is a song.
translation.ko: 앰버 왕비님, 리처드 국왕님 제 선물은 노래입니다

translation.en: ♪ Hark the herald angels sing ♪
♪ Glory to the new born king ♪
♪ Peace on earth and mercy mild ♪
♪ God and sinners reconcile ♪
Thank you.
King Tai played beautifully. [chuckles]
[chuckles, inhales] Everyone adores King Tai.
He is the only leader Penglia needs.
But he's not the only leader Penglia has.
[playfully scoffs] You and King Richard are truly a team.
translation.ko: 왕비님과 리처드 국왕님은 진정한 한 팀이에요

translation.en: I do admire that.
I think you deserve more credit.
translation.ko: 왕비께선 더 인정받을 자격이 있다고 봐요

translation.en: Credit is not something I seek.
Looks like our queens are getting along nicely.
Happy wife, happy life.
Speaking of which, mind if we slip out for a moment?
Sure.
Excuse me.
Please, could you tell me the status on the search of the treaty?
translation.ko: 협의문 수색 상황을 알려주실 수 있을까요?

translation.en: Well, we remain certain it's still in the palace.
translation.ko: 궁 안에 있다는 것만큼은 여전히 확신합니다

translation.en: King Richard has called for a specially trained police dog
translation.ko: 특수 훈련을 받은 탐지견이 냄새로 협의문을 찾을 수 있도록

translation.en: to sniff out the artifact.
The dog arrives tomorrow morning.
Okay. Thank you.
I promised I'd build the crib on my own but I found the instructions impenetrable.
translation.ko: 혼자 아기 침대를 만든다고 했는데 설명서가 도저히 이해 안 돼서요

translation.en: I remember building our baby's crib. [sighs]
translation.ko: 제 아이의 침대를 만들었던 게 기억나요

translation.en: Took me a month. [chuckles]
We each rule a kingdom. This can't be beyond us.
translation.ko: 왕국을 통치하는 사람들이 침대 하나 못 만들 순 없죠

translation.en: -[book thuds closed] -We'll build like we lead, by instinct.
[sighs] I never knew how complicated preparing for a baby would be.
translation.ko: 아이를 위한 준비가 이렇게 복잡할 줄 몰랐어요

translation.en: Did it take you a long time to feel comfortable with fatherhood?
Only until the birth, then it was automatic. [chuckles]
I never experienced feeling that type of love before.
When the most dire problem in the kingdom pales to a scuffed knee,
translation.ko: 왕국에서 가장 끔찍한 문제가 아이 무릎에 난 생채기가 되면

translation.en: you know you are a parent.
-[classical "We Three Kings" playing] -I read more of that history book today and you know what?
translation.ko: 오늘 그 역사책을 더 읽어 봤는데 그거 아세요?

translation.en: This isn't the first time the treaty's disappeared.
translation.ko: 협의문이 사라진 건 이번이 처음이 아니래요

translation.en: It's not?
Two hundred years ago, there was another incident, here in Aldovia.
translation.ko: 200년 전에 이곳 알도비아에서 다른 사건이 있었다고 해요

translation.en: The thief made off with the treaty, but was caught red-handed.
Spent the rest of his years locked in a dungeon.
Princess Emily, please don't fret, I have never heard of such a legend.
translation.ko: 에밀리 공주님, 염려 마십시오 그런 이야기는 처음 들어 봅니다

translation.en: And nor have I.
I have.
I started working for your grandparents when I was just a lad.
translation.ko: 전 젊을 때부터 공주님의 조부모님 밑에서 일했죠

translation.en: They told me that the ghost of that wretched thief
translation.ko: 그분들 말씀에 따르면 그 서툰 도둑의 영혼이

translation.en: still roamed the darkest depths of the dungeon,
translation.ko: 지하 감옥의 가장 어두운 곳을 배회한다더군요

translation.en: searching for his coveted prize.
-I've never heard such nonsense. -Neither have I, Your Majesty.
translation.ko: 그런 말도 안 되는 얘긴 처음 들어 보네 저도 처음입니다, 전하

translation.en: -[Queen Helena laughs heartily] -I was of the same mind, Your Majesty.
Then, one Christmas Eve, despite all the warnings,
translation.ko: 그런데 어느 크리스마스이브에 수많은 경고에도 불구하고

translation.en: I snuck into the dungeon.
And?
I heard a tortured moaning.
Then I felt a chilling breeze...
and then...
I ran.
Okay, so this is my favorite.
-Aw! [chuckles] He's so cute! -I know.
Queen Helena said that it was Richard's favorite childhood toy.
translation.ko: 어머님 말씀으로는 리처드가 제일 좋아하던 장난감이래요

translation.en: Mr. Paddy Claw Paws.
Oh... I hope you have veto rights on your baby's name.
translation.ko: 너한테 아기 이름 거부권이 있어야 할 텐데

translation.en: -[Amber] Oh, okay, very good. -[curious instrumentals]
I can't believe you made this for me.
-I hope you like it. -I love it.
It's a special Penglian pattern my grandmother taught me.
translation.ko: 제 할머니가 가르쳐주신 특별한 펭글리아식 문양이에요

translation.en: [Amber] She must've been very talented.
-[Queen Ming] She was. -[Amber] Thank you. I appreciate it.
They're such fun.
I think we're almost done here.
Looks like it.
I'm sorry for all the strife the treaty has caused.
Well it's not your doing the treaty disappeared, right?
translation.ko: 협의문이 사라진 건 왕께서 하신 일이 아니잖아요 그렇죠?

translation.en: Well, it's not that.
I know that Ming was uneasy about the idea of her and Amber signing it.
translation.ko: 밍 왕비께서 제 아내와 협정에 서명하는 걸 불편하게 여기셨죠

translation.en: I'm happy for Ming to sign,
but she's worried what our people will think if she seeks credit,
translation.ko: 아내는 명예나 좇는다고 국민들이 오해할까 걱정해요

translation.en: despite all she does for Penglia.
Aldovia has embraced Queen Amber.
Penglia adores Ming.
She deserves her due.
Not bad for a couple of kings on their own.
translation.ko: 왕 두 명이 알아서 한 것치곤 나쁘지 않군요

translation.en: -Look at that. -Huh.
-Uh-oh... -What?
Pretty sure this is meant to be on the outside.
-Is it? -[exhales]
-Do you think it matters? -[bed creaks, crashes]
-[sighs deeply] -I think it might.
You really haven't missed a beat.
[Lynn] You...
are not so bad yourself.
I think we deserve everything that's coming to us.
translation.ko: 뭐가 굴러오든 우리는 받을 자격 있어

translation.en: There's something I want to show you. Come with me.
translation.ko: 보여주고 싶은 게 있어, 따라와 봐

translation.en: -Simon! -Melissa, I--
I was... [stammers]
How about some tea?
What's that you're hiding?
Nothing.
What's really going on with you and Lynn?
translation.ko: 자기하고 린 사이에 무슨 일이 있는 거지?

translation.en: What's going on?
I told you, she's just an old friend.
Okay.
We dated, briefly, at school.
Two dates, three at the most.
translation.ko: 두 번, 많아 봐야 세 번이었어

translation.en: We quickly realized we're better suited as friends.
translation.ko: 친구로 지내는 게 훨씬 어울린다는 걸 금세 깨달았지

translation.en: Now, about that tea.
translation.ko: 이제 그 차 얘기 좀 할게

translation.en: Amber was right about you.
translation.ko: 앰버가 자길 두고 한 말이 맞았어

translation.en: An early Christmas gift.
You two can match.
Melissa.
It's Simon and Lynn together.
What's going on? What's wrong?
You were right about Simon's intentions. He's hiding things.
translation.ko: 사이먼에 관한 네 얘기가 맞았어 그 사람 뭔가 숨기고 있어

translation.en: Look at this.
This is private financial information about the trade agreement.
translation.ko: 무역 협정과 관련된 비밀 재무 정보예요

translation.en: Is this an assessment of Aldovia's debt to Penglia,
translation.ko: 알도비아가 펭글리아에 갚아야 할 부채 추정액이

translation.en: a billion euros?
That sounds correct.
But a year ago it was five billion,
and with our economy, it should be gone by spring.
translation.ko: 우리 경제 상황으론 내년 봄이면 다 갚게 될 거야

translation.en: -[mellow instrumentals] -Unless the treaty is broken.
In which case it's due immediately.
Simon's helping Lynn for a piece of the action.
translation.ko: 사이먼이 린을 도와 한몫 잡으려는 거였어

translation.en: Selling out his own kingdom.
I say we make a formal accusation.
I'll help you make it.
I'm so sorry, Melissa. I never wanted to be right about him.
translation.ko: 미안해, 멜리사, 사이먼에 관한 내 말이 맞길 바란 건 아니었어

translation.en: I didn't want you to be, either.
We have a Malinois, a police dog arriving first thing.
translation.ko: 말리누아종 경찰견이 내일 일찍 올 거예요

translation.en: Once it sniffs out the treaty, we'll make a move.
translation.ko: 그 개가 협의문을 찾아내면 본격적으로 움직이죠

translation.en: -Why wait? -We have to have proof.
translation.ko: 왜 미뤄요? 증거가 있어야죠 귀빈 신경을 거스르면 안 돼요

translation.en: Can't offend the Penglians.
translation.ko: 증거가 있어야죠 귀빈 신경을 거스르면 안 돼요

translation.en: As long as this treaty is signed by midnight tomorrow.
translation.ko: 내일 자정까지 협약에 서명하는 한 말이야

translation.en: Meanwhile, I want you to keep an eye on Simon.
-I'd rather not look at him right now. -Please.
It's important he doesn't suspect a thing.
Our baby's future depends on it.
On the treaty? How?
Sit down.
Melissa.
You of all people know me better than that.
No, it's too pathetic.
Melissa,
you just don't understand how things work in a palace.
translation.ko: 궁이 어떻게 돌아가는지 자기는 잘 모르잖아

translation.en: No, too arrogant.
Melissa,
if you could only trust--
You came back?
-[dog pants] -I grew up with this breed, Your Majesties.
translation.ko: 어렸을 때 이 종을 키워 봤습니다

translation.en: Their sense of smell is unsurpassed.
The treaty will be sniffed out imminently.
translation.ko: 냄새를 맡아 협의문을 곧바로 찾아낼 겁니다

translation.en: Can you please tell me the status on Aldovia's roadways?
translation.ko: 알도비아의 도로 상태를 알려주실 수 있을까요?

translation.en: Fully plowed by the end of day.
And the airport?
Rescheduled to open this evening.
I've already spoken to our pilot. We depart at first clearing.
translation.ko: 조종사와 이미 얘길 나눴습니다 항로가 열리자마자 출발합니다

translation.en: Have faith. The dog will find it.
Mr. Little has advised that we remain outside the palace
translation.ko: 리틀 씨의 조언에 따르면 탐지견 수색에 방해되지 않도록 모두 외출하는 게 좋겠다고 해요

translation.en: so the dog can work without distraction.
translation.ko: 탐지견 수색에 방해되지 않도록 모두 외출하는 게 좋겠다고 해요

translation.en: Where are we to go?
Aldovia's Christmas market is just a short walk down the hill.
translation.ko: 언덕을 조금 내려가면 크리스마스 시장이 있는데

translation.en: It's absolutely magical on Christmas Eve.
Perfect place to hope for a Christmas miracle.
translation.ko: 크리스마스의 기적을 바라기에 딱 좋은 곳이네

translation.en: A Christmas Eve miracle. -We only have till midnight. -♪ ...goodwill to men ♪
translation.ko: 크리스마스이브의 기적이야 자정이 얼마 안 남았어

translation.en: -♪ The world in solemn stillness lay... ♪ -Oh! It's Queen Amber!
translation.ko: 넌 너무 웃겨 톰은 알아서 와줬네 앰버 왕비다!

translation.en: [gasps] It's Queen Amber!
-[gasps] Merry Christmas, Queen Amber! -Oh!
[man] So lovely to see you both.
translation.ko: 두 분 다 만나뵙게 되어 좋아요

translation.en: [Richard] Thank you very much.
[Amber] Hi, Merry Christmas.
-Hello, merry Christmas. -You look amazing.
[Amber] Thank you so much.
-Hello. -[Richard] Hello.
Merry Christmas, Queen Amber.
-Merry Christmas, Queen Amber. -[choir continues]
Happy Christmas, King Richard.
-Thank you. -Are you enjoying the market?
translation.ko: - 크리스마스 잘 보내세요, 전하 - 고맙습니다 시장에 오니 즐거우신지요?

translation.en: [Amber] Loving the market. Thank you so much.
The people adore their Queen Amber.
-[Richard and Amber chuckle] -I'd say they're both beloved.
translation.ko: 두 사람 다 사랑받는 것 같아 크리스마스 시장 좋네요

translation.en: You deserve the same.
You should accept the credit for all you do for Penglia.
-[Amber] Hi, everyone. [laughs] -[Richard laughs]
Queen Ming, King Tai, do come and join us.
translation.ko: 밍 왕비님, 타이 국왕님 두 분도 함께하시죠

translation.en: -That looks fun. -♪ Making spirits bright ♪
-♪ A sleighing song tonight ♪ -Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
-I wish. - ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells ♪
-♪ O' what fun it is to ride ♪ -Say no more.
I can't believe they let us do this.
Sometimes it's very useful to be king.
translation.ko: 왕이라는 신분이 아주 유용할 때가 있지

translation.en: Or a princess.
Faster, faster!
[laughs] You asked for it!
We will turn you into an extreme winter sports athlete yet.
translation.ko: 우리가 공주님을 겨울 스포츠 선수로 만들어주죠

translation.en: -I'd like to try snow kiting. -Oh!
Perhaps next year.
You're my witness, Tom. You heard my brother.
translation.ko: 네가 증인이야, 톰 오라버니 얘기 들었지?

translation.en: This looks so fun.
I'll see you on the ice, all right?
Come on, keep up!
You're such a show-off.
-[Richard] Keep up. -And can't promise anything.
translation.ko: - 우쭐댄다고? - 난 스케이트 빨리 못 타

translation.en: Don't fall behind. What?
Are you hurt?
-[ice whooshes] -He's a lot tougher than he looks.
[sighs] I'm really not, actually.
I feel like a ballerina!
Look at them.
-That was amazing. -[man yells joyfully]
For a moment, I almost forgot about everything.
-It's going to be fine. -[Amber sighs deeply]
With us and the baby.
I hope so.
King Tai.
Come on, Ming.
It's been too long not skating.
Anything else?
[gasps] Archery!
That's something I can do.
-I challenge anyone to archery. -[Queen Helena] You may regret it.
translation.ko: 활이라면 누구랑 붙어도 자신 있지 후회하실 수도 있어요

translation.en: We have a champion archer in the fold.
Champion archer? Me?
According to Queen Helena.
I've seen her stop an embezzler with her bow.
translation.ko: 왕비가 횡령범을 활쏘기로 막는 걸 봤어요

translation.en: Sounds like a bit of fun.
Visiting kingdom shoots first.
Richard...
Nicely done, my dear.
Excellent shot, my Queen.
Clear your mind and focus on what's most important.
translation.ko: 마음을 비우고 제일 중요한 것에 집중하세요

translation.en: You got this.
Excuse me, Your Majesties, a message from the palace regarding the treaty.
translation.ko: 실례합니다, 협의문과 관련해서 궁에서 전갈이 왔습니다

translation.en: The dog failed, the treaty remains lost.
translation.ko: 탐지견이 실패했습니다 협의문을 아직 못 찾았습니다

translation.en: -Whoa. Bullseye! -[Amber sighs]
She's fainted.
Let's just make it to the chaise.
Really, Richard, [stammers] I'm okay.
-I just want to make sure. -[Amber sighs]
Doctor Magoro. Sir, it's Dr. Magoro.
Thank you.
-I understand the Queen's fainted? -Yes.
Yes, she fainted, but she's awake now.
-She has been overdoing it. -[Richard] I thought so.
You've overdone it.
She needs rest.
[Richard] Rest, yes. I'll tell her.
Why don't I drive to the palace?
We'd be very grateful.Thank you.
She's on her way.
I told you, I'm fine.
Still, you must rest until she gets here.
That's doctor's and king's orders.
Princess' orders as well.
Rest.
How can I when we only have until midnight?
translation.ko: 자정이 얼마 안 남았는데 어떻게 쉬어?

translation.en: How long?
Great, thank you.
The airport is opening shortly.
Will you please arrange transport?
I will see to it, Miss Lynn.
There you are.
Sorry, I have some news.
The airport is open.
The Penglians are leaving.
[Queen Helena] Oh my goodness.
Shall I speak to them?
-Please, Mother. -Mr. Zabala
Yes, of course, Your Majesty. Excuse me.
What do we do now?
We have to expose Simon and Lynn.
It's our last hope to find the treaty.
Absolutely.
Simon?
He and Lynn have been conspiring since she arrived.
translation.ko: 린이 도착한 후로 두 사람은 음모를 꾸몄어요

translation.en: -That's disgraceful. -But not unexpected.
translation.ko: 어떻게 그런 일이 놀랄 일도 아니지

translation.en: Listen, something is nagging at me.
Call it instinct.
If we are correct, and Simon and Lynn took the treaty and hid it,
translation.ko: 우리가 옳다면 사이먼과 린은 협의문을 가져가서 숨겨놨어요

translation.en: why didn't the police dog find it?
-We'll have to ask Simon. -But there's more.
translation.ko: - 사이먼한테 물어봐야지 - 그것 말고 또 있어

translation.en: The old scandal between Prince Claude and Prince Jun.
translation.ko: 클로드 왕자와 준 왕자의 예전 추문도 그래

translation.en: The family swore they would get revenge.
Maybe that's why the treaty was nearly stolen 200 years ago.
translation.ko: 그래서 200년 전에 협의문이 도난당할 뻔했는지도 몰라요

translation.en: The treaty was stolen before?
What, what's wrong?
I don't know, cramping. [pants] Cramping bad.
translation.ko: 모르겠어, 배가 뭉쳤어 배 뭉침이 너무 심해

translation.en: Oh my gosh.
Does that mean...
-I think so. -What is it?
I'm going into labor.
Hello? King Richard?
Doctor, Amber's gone into labor.
Labor? Now?
No, no, no, she's not due until January, Your Majesty.
Her back hurts and she has cramping.
Could be forced labor due to over activity.
translation.ko: 과도한 활동으로 인한 이른 진통일 수 있겠네요

translation.en: She has been very active.
Tell the Queen, deep breaths and remain calm.
All right. Thank you, Doctor.
See you very soon. Bye.
-Is it true? Have you gone into labor? -It appears so.
translation.ko: 정말 진통이 왔어? 그런 것 같아요

translation.en: -How far apart are the contractions? -Close. Getting stronger.
translation.ko: 진통 간격은 어느 정도죠? 짧아요, 점점 강해지고요

translation.en: We call them surges as per the doctor -who's on her way. -[phone ringing]
translation.ko: 지금 오고 계신 박사님 조언대로 진통 대신 고조로 부르고 있어요

translation.en: This is her.
[Dr. Magoro] King Richard...
I found myself in a bit of a situation.
[exhales] Where are you?
North road. Stay in your car.
What is it?
She's stuck in a snow bank.
But the baby's coming.
I used to volunteer at a maternity ward. I will help you through this.
translation.ko: 산모 병동에서 자원봉사 해봤어요 제가 도와드릴게요

translation.en: Tai, cancel our flight.
Of course. Lynn!
Thank you, Queen Ming.
-I'll get Dr. Magoro. -[exhales] Richard!
I'll be back with her as soon as I can.
You can do this, birth plan or not.
translation.ko: 계획과는 달라도 당신은 할 수 있어

translation.en: I love you.
-I love you. -[kissing sound]
-[Amber inhales] -Take care of her, please.
Richard, we heard about Amber. Is there--
-[gruff] I'll deal with you later. -[Simon] Wh--
-Good boy, let's go. -[thudding]
I too had the baby come early.
-You did? -My son.
He's okay?
He's intelligent, capable
-and has the energy of three boys. -[Amber sighs]
translation.ko: 기운이 어찌나 좋은지 아들 셋을 합쳐 놓은 것 같죠

translation.en: Your baby will be perfectly fine.
Your child is strong, Amber. Like you and Richard.
translation.ko: 네 아이는 강하단다 너하고 리처드처럼 말이지

translation.en: But I can't help but worry that it's going to be midnight soon.
If that treaty isn't signed,
my baby is cursed.
Emily!
I told you not to worry Amber with that nonsense.
translation.ko: 그 헛소리로 괜한 걱정 시키지 말랬잖니

translation.en: But what if it's true?
Sorcery was discredited a long time ago,
for good reason.
Many old treaties involved punitive superstitions.
translation.ko: 많은 옛 협정들은 징벌적 미신을 동반해요

translation.en: -It's not unusual. -[Amber sighs]
Tell me about this one.
Well, what I read was about a sorceress that cast a spell.
translation.ko: 제가 읽은 건 주문을 외우는 마법사 얘기였어요

translation.en: Not tonight.
-Come on! -[horse brays]
The curse affects the firstborn child
of whichever kingdom causes the truce to break.
Typical for its time, but that time is not our time.
translation.ko: 그 시대에는 흔한 얘기지만 지금은 그때와 전혀 달라요

translation.en: Still...
You don't want to risk it, I understand,
translation.ko: 괜한 모험을 하기 싫으신 건 저도 알아요

translation.en: as small a chance as it may be.
A mother's love for her child is greater than anything.
translation.ko: 아이를 향한 엄마의 사랑은 그 무엇보다 위대하죠

translation.en: Someone in this palace sabotaged the signing of the treaty. Why?
translation.ko: 궁에 있는 누군가가 협정 체결을 방해했어요, 이유가 뭘까요?

translation.en: [exhales] Your Majesty! I've spoken to the doctor
and she said it's acceptable to administer pain medication for your...
translation.ko: 진통제를 투여해도 괜찮다고 합니다, 왕비 전하의...

translation.en: surges.
Thank you, Mrs. Averill, but I need to keep my mind sharp.
translation.ko: 애버릴 씨, 고맙지만 정신이 몽롱해지면 안 돼요

translation.en: Amber...
We all want what's best for your baby and for you.
translation.ko: 우리 모두 네 아기와 너한테 제일 좋은 것만 해주고 싶단다

translation.en: Please try not to worry needlessly.
Maybe it isn't needless.
It could be real. After all, our dungeon is haunted.
translation.ko: 진짜일지도 몰라요 우리 지하 감옥엔 유령이 나와요

translation.en: -Haunted? -Yes.
Mr. Little even encountered it,
the ghost of the thief who stole the treaty 200 years ago.
translation.ko: 200년 전에 협의문을 훔쳤던 도둑의 유령을 말이죠

translation.en: [breathless] Emily, listen to me.
I need you to do something for me right now. [sharp exhale]
Why on earth did Amber want us to come down here?
translation.ko: 앰버는 대체 왜 우리한테 여기로 내려오라고 했을까?

translation.en: She insists we search the furthest corner.
[Emily] Pray we avoid the ghost that haunts this dungeon.
translation.ko: 이 지하 감옥 유령을 부디 피해 갈 수 있기를

translation.en: You're not scared of the made-up ghost, are you?
translation.ko: 설마 가짜 유령을 무서워하는 건 아니겠지?

translation.en: What was that?
Just-- Just our imaginations.
Working in unison.
Come along.
[Emily] Leopold was here.
Now we are.
-[keys jingling] -[Emily] Oh, no!
[yelling] Help!
Oh, dear.
[Emily, yelling] Help! Help us!
Help!
Please help!
Dr. Magoro?
-Are you all right? -I am now, thank you.
I trust you know how to ride. [exhales]
-I do, indeed. -[door clicks open]
-Poor thing. -[continued groaning]
This is not the time, Simon.
Amber.
You look like you could use these.
translation.ko: 이걸 이용해 보시면 좋을 것 같아요

translation.en: Squeeze these when you're feeling overwhelmed.
translation.ko: 견디기 힘들 땐 이걸 꽉 잡아보세요

translation.en: Works for me.
Thank you, Simon.
The hot water you requested, Your Majesty.
I need a heating pad and a paint roller with a good handle.
translation.ko: 전기담요하고 손잡이가 튼튼한 페인트 롤러가 필요해요

translation.en: Of course, straight away.
I have a heating pad and good luck with the roller.
Is there anything we can do to help?
I am charged with finding a paint roller in a palace.
-I possess such an item. -[playful instrumentals]
-Really? -You do?
With a good handle?
A very excellent handle, yes.
And may I ask why?
No, you may not, Andrew.
Come, Mr. Z.
-We will get it. -Thank you.
[Emily, yelling] Help! Please help us!
Help!
It's no use, darling, no one can hear us.
translation.ko: 소용없어 우리 소리는 아무도 못 들어

translation.en: Look, a key!
-[sighs] It's too far. -[strained exhale]
[breathless] That's really helping.
How long did you volunteer at the hospital?
-Many years. -You certainly learned a lot.
I learned no job is more demanding or rewarding than motherhood.
translation.ko: 엄마가 되는 것보다 더 고되고 보람찬 일은 없다는 걸 배웠죠

translation.en: Penglia now has services in place
to assist and support all of our mothers in any way they might need.
translation.ko: 각종 지원을 제공해 주는 서비스가 있어요

translation.en: [exhales] I heard about that program, it's fantastic.
I'm trying to implement something similar here,
translation.ko: 우리 나라에서도 비슷한 걸 시행하려 해요

translation.en: with a few updates.
-You're so close. -[grunts]
That's it, almost. You have it, you've got it.
-You got it! -[strains]
There you are. Good girl.
Almost there.
Lift it up.
-Emily! -[thud]
Emily, are you all right?
-Yes, I'm fine. -The stone didn't hurt you?
translation.ko: - 네, 괜찮아요 - 돌 때문에 다치진 않았어?

translation.en: Look, in there.
-I can't believe it. -The missing treaty.
What was that?
The ghost, coming to get the treaty.
-[pants] -No, listen.
It's the wind blowing through the stones.
-[stammers] So, no ghost? -[exhales]
No.
But we have the treaty.
But we're still locked in.
-[Richard] Amber. -[Amber] Richard.
-[Richard pants] How are you? -No baby yet.
translation.ko: 당신 괜찮아? 아기는 아직 안 나왔어

translation.en: Everything's going to be fine, Your Majesty.
How far apart are the surges?
Five minutes, progressing steadily.
Ah. Thank you for being so attentive.
It's useless.
It's nearly midnight.
It's over.
We mustn't give up.
But what can we do?
This.
[chuckles] Brilliant, Mother.
The linens, doctor.
[Amber] What time is it?
Ten minutes to midnight.
[breathless] Where are they?
The treaty, we found the treaty.
What? Where?
In the dungeon.
How did you know?
Amber solved the mystery.
I did.
Come in, everyone. You all need to hear this.
Someone right here, in this very room, stole the treaty.
translation.ko: 이 방에 있는 누군가가 협의문을 훔쳤어요

translation.en: [Richard] Tell us everything you know.
The scandal that followed the signing of the treaty
resulted in the alleged poisoning of Prince Claude.
translation.ko: 결국 클로드 왕자가 독살됐다는 의심으로 이어졌죠

translation.en: His family swore vengeance
and a member of that family is in this room.
translation.ko: 그 가족 구성원이 이 방 안에 있어요

translation.en: [Richard] Go on.
Prince Claude's family name, Devon, was familiar to me
translation.ko: 클로드 왕자의 성인 데번이 익숙하게 느껴졌는데

translation.en: and tonight I remembered why.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 그 이유를 기억해 냈어요

translation.en: I read it in this book.
Your mother's maiden name was Devin.
Wasn't it, Mr. Little?
I know it was you, Mr. Little.
You were the last one to lock up the treaty,
you kept the dog out of the dungeon
translation.ko: 개를 지하 감옥에 들어오지 못하게 했고

translation.en: and you tried to keep Emily out of the dungeon
with some made-up ghost story.
translation.ko: 에밀리 공주를 지하 감옥에 가지 못하게 하려 했죠

translation.en: -[continued sighing] -If you're guilty, Mr. Little,
confess here and now.
I did do it.
To break the truce
and sever our ties with Penglia.
translation.ko: 우리 나라와 펭글리아의 관계를 끊으려 했습니다

translation.en: But why?
I was bound by a solemn blood oath,
a sworn duty to avenge the crime against my family
translation.ko: 펭글리아의 준 왕자가 우리 가족에 지은 죄에

translation.en: by the Penglian Prince Jun.
Mr. Little, Prince Jun's guilt was never proven.
translation.ko: 리틀 씨, 준 왕자의 죄는 입증된 적이 없어요

translation.en: Our historians believe that the real culprit
was a covetous feudal lord.
I had a duty. I fulfilled it.
translation.ko: 저에겐 의무가 있었고 그걸 실천에 옮겼을 뿐입니다

translation.en: You nearly started a war.
And could have cursed an innocent baby.
translation.ko: 죄 없는 아기가 저주를 받을 수도 있었고요

translation.en: I didn't know about the curse until tonight.
translation.ko: 그 저주 얘긴 오늘 밤에야 알게 됐습니다

translation.en: And I would never bring harm to your baby.
translation.ko: 두 분의 아기에게는 결코 해를 입히지 않을 겁니다

translation.en: -[Queen Helena] Mr. Zabala. -Ma'am?
Take Mr. Little to the Leopold Suite.
-[dark instrumentals] -At once.
Simon,
I apologize for my behavior earlier.
Did you think...
We had our suspicions.
Not you, too!
Lynn and I have been working diligently
translation.ko: 린과 난 협약 내 경제 관련 조항을 열심히 손봤을 뿐이야

translation.en: on economic amendments to the treaty which should benefit both kingdoms.
translation.ko: 린과 난 협약 내 경제 관련 조항을 열심히 손봤을 뿐이야 양국에 보탬이 되려고

translation.en: And we've found a very promising solution.
That's all it was, I promise.
What is it?
When I came to your room last night after Lynn left, you hid something.
translation.ko: 어젯밤 자기 방에 갔을 때 나 몰래 물건을 숨겼잖아

translation.en: [stammers] How can that relate to the treaty?
It didn't.
Lynn was helping to make sure I chose well
translation.ko: 린은 날 도와주고 있었어 자기한테 줄 제일 중요한 선물을 잘 고를 수 있게 말이야

translation.en: when picking out the most important gift I'll offer you.
translation.ko: 자기한테 줄 제일 중요한 선물을 잘 고를 수 있게 말이야

translation.en: I wanted to wait until tomorrow, but...
Melissa, my love...
Although I'm undeserving of such an honor,
translation.ko: 이런 영광을 누리기엔 내가 너무 부족하지만

translation.en: will you marry me?
-[whimsical instrumentals] -Yes! Yes. -Yes! -[laughter]
[Richard] Congratulations.
Congratulations, Simon.
[Emily] Congratulations, Melissa.
You could have done worse.
Oh, that's a ringing endorsement. [chuckles]
Don't let it get to your head.
translation.ko: 내 말은 너무 신경 쓰지 마

translation.en: I see a royal title in your future, Simon.
translation.ko: 내 눈에는 형의 미래에 왕실 작위가 보이는걸

translation.en: Perhaps Duke?
I accept.
This is such wonderful news. I'm so happy for you.
translation.ko: 정말 멋진 소식이네요 다들 잘돼서 기뻐요

translation.en: But we're running out of time. It's nearly midnight
and there's a treaty to sign.
-Quickly. -[Queen Ming] Yes.
translation.ko: 서둘러 주세요 네, 왕비들이 서명할 시간도 마련해 주셔야 해요

translation.en: We must allow the time for the Queens to sign as well.
translation.ko: 네, 왕비들이 서명할 시간도 마련해 주셔야 해요

translation.en: There's always time to make history.
translation.ko: 역사에 남을 일을 할 시간은 늘 있어요

translation.en: [sharp exhale] But not too much time.
Your Majesty, King Tai.
The visiting monarch signs first.
After you, my Queen.
You have made me and all of Penglia very proud.
translation.ko: 나와 펭글리아 왕국 전체가 당신을 자랑스러워해

translation.en: At the hour of 11:59, on December the 24th in the year 2019,
I declare the truce and treaty between the kingdoms of Aldovia and Penglia
translation.ko: 알도비아와 펭글리아 왕국 간의 휴전 협약이 갱신되어

translation.en: executed, ratified and renewed for the next 100 years.
We made it.
-[exhales] -Merry Christmas.
-Happy anniversary. -[cheery instrumentals]
Merry Christmas, everyone.
-Merry Christmas! -[excited chatter]
-Merry Christmas, Mrs. Averill. -[laughs]
I think it's time.
-[Amber exhales] -Everyone except the father, out.
The royal baby is ready to make its entrance.
translation.ko: 왕실 아기가 세상에 나올 준비가 됐습니다

translation.en: Okay.
-Yes. -[Dr. Magoro] Thank you.
Okay.
[clicks tongue] Congratulations.
A healthy, beautiful baby.
[exhales] Thank goodness.
Well done, Amber.
Queen Amber, King Richard,
translation.ko: 앰버 왕비 전하, 리처드 국왕 전하

translation.en: may I present to you the future monarch of Aldovia,
your daughter.
[chuckles] Hi.
She's beautiful.
She's incredible.
Just like her mother.
Thank you.
Amber and I
are the proud parents...
of a new...
baby girl.
I knew it was a girl.
-Congratulations. -Thank you.
Your father would be overjoyed if he were here.
translation.ko: 어머니 네 아버지가 여기 계신다면 정말 기뻐하실 거야

translation.en: Mr. Zabala, champagne for the baby girl!
translation.ko: 자발라 씨 손녀를 위한 샴페인 좀 부탁해요

translation.en: Girl? Did I just hear I have a granddaughter?
Merry Christmas, everyone.
I fought my way onto the first flight.
You're just in time to meet her. Mother, Rudy.
translation.ko: 시간 맞춰서 잘 오셨어요 어머니, 장인어른

translation.en: Pop, you made it.
How's my little peanut?
Never better.
Meet your granddaughter, Elleri.
You named her after mom.
Elleri.
-You're perfect. -[laughs]
-Here. -Ooh!
Come to grandpa.
-[Amber] She likes you. -[Rudy laughs]
Elleri.
Such a beautiful name.
Beautiful baby. Congratulations.
The plane is standing by.
We can be back in Penglia by sunrise to enjoy Christmas with your children.
translation.ko: 해뜨기 전에 귀국해서 아이들과 크리스마스를 보내실 수 있습니다

translation.en: Go home, be with your family.
And Ming...
thank you for everything.
Thank you.
Call me anytime.
Even better, bring your little one for a visit.
We can discuss our programs for mothers in person.
translation.ko: 어머니를 위한 정책에 대해 만나서 논의하면 좋겠어요

translation.en: I'd love to.
[King Tai] King Richard, it's been an adventure.
[Queen Ming] A Penglian symbol of mother's nurturing strength.
translation.ko: 아이 키우는 어머니의 힘을 상징하는 펭글리아 보석이에요

translation.en: It's yours now.
Are you sure?
Queen Amber of Aldovia,
you are going to be a wonderful mother.
Thank you.
Today, her Royal Highness, Queen Amber of Aldovia,
safely delivered a daughter,
Princess Elleri Claire Charlton.
[woman 3] Come on, Princess!
[man 2] Congratulations.
I love our princess.
So do I.
I love you.
[Amber] I want to thank you all, my loyal readers,
translation.ko: 이 놀라운 여정을 함께해 주신 독자 여러분께

translation.en: for sharing this amazing journey with me.
I couldn't be more grateful.
On behalf of Richard, myself, Elleri and the Royal family of Aldovia,
translation.ko: 리처드와 저, 엘러리를 비롯한 알도비아 왕가를 대표해서

translation.en: we wish you all a very Merry Christmas
and a Happy New Year.
